00011 // clay.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "material.h"
00014 // Clay Class Declarations
00015 class Clay : public Material {
00016 public:
00017         Clay(Reference<Texture<float> > bump) : bumpMap(bump) { }
00018         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const; // NOBOOK
00019 private:
00020         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap;
00021 };
00022 
00023 // Clay Method Definitions
00024 BSDF *Clay::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00025         // Declare clay coefficients
00026         static float diffuse[3] = {   0.383626f,   0.260749f,   0.274207f };
00027         static float xy0[3] =     {  -1.089701f,  -1.102701f,  -1.107603f };
00028         static float z0[3] =      {  -1.354682f,  -2.714801f,  -1.569866f };
00029         static float e0[3] =      {  17.968505f,  11.024489f,  21.270282f };
00030         static float xy1[3] =     {  -0.733381f,  -0.793320f,  -0.848206f };
00031         static float z1[3] =      {   0.676108f,   0.679314f,   0.726031f };
00032         static float e1[3] =      {   8.219745f,   9.055139f,  11.261951f };
00033         static float xy2[3] =     {  -1.010548f,  -1.012378f,  -1.011263f };
00034         static float z2[3] =      {   0.910783f,   0.885239f,   0.892451f };
00035         static float e2[3] =      { 152.912795f, 141.937171f, 201.046802f };
00036         static Spectrum xy[3] = { Spectrum(xy0), Spectrum(xy1), Spectrum(xy2) };
00037         static Spectrum z[3] = { Spectrum(z0), Spectrum(z1), Spectrum(z2) };
00038         static Spectrum e[3] = { Spectrum(e0), Spectrum(e1), Spectrum(e2) };
00039         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00040         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00041         if (bumpMap)
00042                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00043         else
00044                 dgs = dgShading;
00045         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00046         bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(Lafortune)(Spectrum(diffuse), 3, xy, xy, z, e,
00047                 BxDFType(BSDF_REFLECTION | BSDF_DIFFUSE)));
00048         return bsdf;
00049 }
00050 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00051                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00052         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00053         return new Clay(bumpMap);
00054 }
